Clipping doesnt do ANYTHING!

If you look at how occlusion works, it only cares about stuff within a stack of parts. I suspect the main culprit here are those decopler stacks, massive part counts tend to increase drag even if they are occluded according to the system. The ONLY way to get low drag is to shove all your utility parts into a service/cargo bay. Seeing as this is stock you dont have much choice, but you woudl be far better off replacing those stacks of decouplers with say Ibeams or somthing, although i do know it wont have that cool flexibility.

The chassis/driver's sitting area on this is incredibly strong. Took a hit at 200+mps and didn't break. The rest of the craft wasn't so lucky. It got disintegrated. 5-star rating on shatteringly-powerful crashes, though! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
